entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump “I’m in charge of Operation Warp Speed” so says President Trump. Our ‘I Know more about ..President is now in charge of discovery and administering a Coronavirus Vaccine. At least he has said publicly I AM IN CHARGE. Like asking your auto mechanic to head up Neuro-surgery..
